review: Its a great device. Really happy with its capabilities. Reasonable priced.

review: Love it...big selection to choose from

review: Apparently my internet speed didn't corporate.  I purchase the stick because my smart tv didn't have the compatible app.  Made no difference on streaming compared to Netflix

review: It's nice to be able to have a great selection of things to watch and it's easy to navigate.

review: I purchased it to watch Yupptv channels. The quality is excellent thru wifi. This was surprise to me.

review: this was given to me as a Mother's Day gift,  and I love it.
